info.brief_description: Rachel gets her hands on the infamous size remote
info.description:
READ THE RULES! And stop adding one-sentence chapters just to have more choices. I'll delete them!

Rachel is a sexy secretary in her mid thirties, although she acts bitchy most of the time she isn't really bad at heart. Most of her behaviour is due to her fortysomething supervisor Karen who keeps giving her a hard time. When she gets her hands on a remote that can change the size of objects and/or objects, the fun begins.

Rules Of The Game

- RACHEL IS THE MAIN CHARACTER, STICK WITH HER
- the remote either shrinks or grows a person (so no transforming etc.)
- no toilet stuff (it ruins an interactive far to quickly)
- don't kill the characters
- no male gay, lesbian is more than okay ;)
- no one sentence chapters
- no ending of the story

Have Fun Reading! (and maybe add a chapter if you like)
